Name: YoshiFruitBig
Notes: A big fruit that can be eaten by Yoshi to reveal six Star Bit. Can be targeted by the Orange Luma to make it swing.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted and swung by player 2.

YoshiTargetable.Description: Can be targeted and eaten by Yoshi.
